title: SpongeBob SquarePants movie poster titling font
content:
Hi, I need to know the SpongeBob font. All help would be appreciated. I need it free though. If you can; e-mail a copy of the font to [sonicchao05@gmail.com](mailto:sonicchao05@gmail.com) .

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [SpongeBob Pic.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172628/http:/typophile.com/files/SpongeBob%20Pic.jpg) | 31.85 KB |

 [‹ (x) Curb Your Enthusiasm logo - Univers {Anastas}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172628/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12775 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) sans serif in Dose Magazine - Whitney {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172628/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12749 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SonicChao

comments.content:
I have a suspicion that the square SpongeBob type sample you showed is a custom font, since this is about as highly commercialized a cartoon as anything outside of Disney. My main reason for saying this is that searches for information about SpongeBob fonts have only led me to some vaguely similar styles, such as the free fonts at [this site](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172628/http:/members.outpost10f.com/~lindax/spongebob/fonts.html).

If that free font isn’t close enough, be prepared to search through all the S fonts at all the free sites you know, for font names that start with Sponge or Square.

For commercial designs that may have similar styles, I would look at Device fonts, Font Diner, Chank and Fonthead.

Just in case, I am looking in [Part 14 (Strange, Distressed Scripts), of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919172628/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script14Pg1.html), but I do not expect to find this font.

- Mike Yanega

My search through Part 14 of the Guide came up with a VERY close approximation that is also a free font. It is called ’Dam’ by Matthew Austin Petty from [Disturbed Fonts](http://web.archive.org/). In my opinion this would be a great substitute for the SpongeBob type you were looking for. It’s certainly closer than the one on that other site in my previous post. I hope this works for you.

- Mike Yanega
Can I get a link to download that font?
Now I see..... but I wish I could get the exact font... :’(
